properties.entry: INSERT INTO HOTEL_ROOM_RESERVATION ( HT_ROOM_BK_NO , HT_SERVICE_TYPE , HT_ROOM_NO , HT_CHECK_IN_TIME , HT_CHECK_OUT_TIME , HT_MEM_NO , HT_PET_NO , HT_PET_NAME , HT_PET_KIND , HT_PET_GENDER , HT_PET_AGE , HT_PET_NEUT , HT_BK_MESSAGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_HT_ROOM_BK_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') , TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
